title: Deploying AI Models to the Cloud
description: Join us for an insightful session on deploying AI models to cloud platforms. Learn best practices, tools, and strategies to effectively manage and scale your AI applications in the cloud.

speakers.name: Beingana Jim Junior
speakers.title: DevOps Engineer
speakers.bio: Beingana Jim Junior is a DevOps Engineer and an active Open Source Contributor with a passion for cloud technologies and AI deployments. With extensive experience in managing cloud infrastructure..
